attributes.action: Labour to reverse right of councils to sell off allotment sites.
attributes.additional_details: Waiting lists already longer than ever. Allotment provision should be included by law in all new build sites
attributes.background: Allotment sites to be protected and upheld not sold off

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Ban councils from selling allotments
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736003
